review.title: A Mixed Graphical Model for Rhythmic Parsing
review.abstract: a method is presented for the continuum approximation problem : setting a sequence over observed subjective note testing times, we estimate the corresponding notated timing and force measurements. a consistency model is constructed that represents successive simultaneous evolution of tempo of rhythm times relates these latter quantities with periods. the rhythm variables are discrete and the tempo and motion variables are continuous. we show a quickly compute the measured most likely configuration of measured tempo occurring environmental variables or an environment of note detection times. comparison experiments are done on a small data frame. linear generalization via numerical interval gaussian distributions is outlined.
histories: Appears in Proceedings of the Seventeenth Conference on Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence (UAI2001)
